name: get_temperature
description: This tool belongs to the daily_context, which provides contextual information relevant to a user's daily routine. Tool description: returns an unevaluated future expression for the temperature of a specific location at a specific time.

location.description: The location where temperature is queried.

time.description: the time the weather forecast for.

future_id.description: ID of a deferred future expression for the temperature value of the location at a specific time.

name: get_temperature_future
description: This tool belongs to the daily_context, which provides contextual information relevant to a user's daily routine. Tool description: evaluate a previously returned future expression for the temperature of a specific location at a specific time and return its numeric result.

future_id.description: ID of a deferred future expression that will be evaluated.

result.description: the numeric result evaluated from the future expression.

name: get_location
description: This tool belongs to the daily_context, which provides contextual information relevant to a user's daily routine. Tool description: returns an unevaluated future expression for user’s location at a specific time from user's calendar.

time.description: The time for which to retrieve the user’s calendar-based location.

future_id.description: ID of a deferred future expression for user’s location at a specific time from user's calendar.

name: get_location_future
description: This tool belongs to the daily_context, which provides contextual information relevant to a user's daily routine. Tool description: evaluate a previously returned future expression for user’s location at a specific time from user's calendar and return its value.

future_id.description: ID of a deferred future expression that will be evaluated.

result.description: the value result evaluated from the future expression.

name: get_work_time
description: get the time when the user gets to work.

dummy.description: Always put true. A dummy variable.

name: get_current_time
